text: Supporting advanced manufacturing will help more people #MakeItInAmerica #MIIAWhatsNext
House Dems are revamping our #MakeItInAmerica jobs plan for 2015. I think an impt part of #MIIAWhatsNext is skills training & education.
Millions of Americans are finding work to #MakeItInAmerica by sharing everything from their skills to their homes & vehicles #MIIAWhatsNext
In order to help more Americans #MakeItInAmerica, we need to spur innovation & job creation here at home #MIIAWhatsNext

For 50 years the Older Americans Act has provided critical support for our seniors.
Here’s to many more! #OAA50
10,000 Americans turn 65 each day – they rely on the Older Americans Act to remain independent. Let’s reauthorize and strengthen OAA. #OAA50
Congratulations to the Older Americans Act for 50 years of serving seniors, caregivers and families. Keep going strong. #OAA50

Over 20,000 seniors die from falls each yr. Strengthening OAA’s fall prevention
programs prevent deaths & injuries. Let’s renew them. #OAA50

1 in 7 Americans is over 60. They need OAA for nutrition, caregiving, health,
employment & other srvcs. Let’s renew & strengthen it. #OAA50

From 2005-2013, over 1.2 billion meals were home delivered because of the Older
Americans Act, including 34,339,232 in Pennsylvania #OAA50

@RepPaulRyan With the GOP budget already drawing flak from House GOP how do you plan on keeping your party united this time? #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan Since your budget was widely panned last year, are you expecting a different reception this time around? #RyanBudgetFail
CONT. @RepPaulRyan ...as “phantom savings” when Democrats included the same number in our budget? Change of heart? #RyanBudgetFail
CONT. @RepPaulRyan assumed expenditures by up to $600B over the next decade after you consistently mocked war savings... #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan Why did you decide to make adjustments for an expected decline in war spending that could reduce... #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan Are you once again planning on converting critical programs such as #Medicaid, into state block grants? #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan How is it possible to bal. the budget in a decade & NOT allow your #Medicare vouchers to affect anyone over 55? #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan Will you admit that your budget uses the same #Medicare savings that you criticized Pres Obama for last year? #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan Are you planning to let the untargeted, irrational sequester cuts stay in place? #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan Which is why you’re including the revenues from the fiscal cliff deal in your budget? #RyanBudgetFail
@RepPaulRyan How do you plan on telling your GOP friends that youve recognized that add revenues are necessary to bring down budget deficits
@RepPaulRyan If you cant lay out exactly what youre cutting and instead include unspecified cuts, how can people take this budget seriously?
@RepPaulRyan Can you let us in on the magic * of savings in your budget? Which don’t include any specifics on what those savings are.

Hospital errors are ↓ 17% since 2010 b/c of penalties for high readmission rates—saving 50,000 lives & $12B in health care costs #ACAWorks

The ACA has added 13 years to the life of the #Medicare trust fund.

Before ACA: Medicare trust fund insolvent by 2017

Now: 2030

#ACAWorks
By closing "donut hole" in #Medicare drug coverage, 8 million seniors & people w/ disabilities saved $12B since 2010, avg of $1500 #ACAWorks
↑ insurers on exchanges = ↑ competition = ↓prices. 44-State analysis shows # of new marketplace insurers 5X greater than # exiting #ACAWorks
Exchange premiums are estimated to be 15% lower in '16 than CBO expected in '10. That's $100B extra budget saving over next decade #ACAWorks
